title: How to check my gift card balance - Quora

response.answer_text: You can check your gift card balance with sites like GiftCardsBUX GiftcardBUX makes it easy to check balance online by taking you to the correct link.  If you are in a hurry then let me highlight what above site covers in detail: 90% of brands have their own links to check gift card balance online. It can be visible mainly on homepage itself.You can contact their customer helpline number directly from your phone for latest updates on your balances.If you in the store, just ask store employee to check for the latest gift card balance which can be done right.Hope it helped!

Sure. Give your gift card to the cashier and ask them to look up your balance. Some websites may (or may not) offer the same functionality online. Given there are tens of thousands of companies that offer gift cards, it is impossible to speak on behalf of all of them as to what their balance inquiry procedures are.
